name: BAD BLOOD (itch)
description:
NOTE: WEBGL MIGHT TAKE A LONG TIME TO LOAD

Your blood is lethal. There will be different types of enemies spawning around the arena which will try to kill you. Whenever you get hit by a bullet a tiny amount of blood is lost and if enemies are in a close enough range of you, they will get hit and take damage from the blood. This is a game based on one of my old games called bad cubes  and was made in 72 hours for a game jam (The theme was "Blood is Lethal").

-Made for the Mini-Jam 118: Vampires

-Music By Context Sensitive: https://www.youtube.com/c/ContextSensitive
